title: MF lore
body: You going to update that? Still sounds like she has no idea that GP killed her mother, yet in ACT III it shows that she knows its him who did it

replies.body: They already did update her lore. http://gameinfo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/missfortune/#champion-lore
then why the hell is her old lore still In the game

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RfMW02dk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-01T00:41:52.750+0000)
>
> then why the hell is her old lore still In the game

Because they haven't been able to put the new larger lores in the client.
they changed graves and tf lores

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RfMW02dk,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-01T02:30:30.351+0000)
>
> they changed graves and tf lores

To the short version. Their long version lore is not in the client. It isn't difficult to understand.

good put in the long version, short versions are boring and crap, their "short versions" look more like what they did to skarner, get rid of any detail on anything and make a general statement, and that is not a lore.
